summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) to the Federal Bureau of Prisons Office of Internal Affairs. It transmits investigative materials related to Correctional Officers Michael Thomas and Tova Noel, who were subjects of an OIG investigation. The case is no longer being prosecuted, and the materials are provided for administrative purposes.

persons.name: Michael Thomas
persons.context: Subject of an OIG investigation. An interview with him was documented in a Memorandum of Investigation dated October 8, 2021.

persons.name: Tova Noel
persons.context: Subject of an OIG investigation. An interview with her was documented in a Memorandum of Investigation dated October 8, 2021.

connections.description: Both are Correctional Officers who were subjects of the same OIG investigation, as referenced in the same memorandum.

events.title: Interview of Michael Thomas documented
events.description: A Memorandum of Investigation was created regarding the interview of Correctional Officer Michael Thomas.

events.title: Interview of Tova Noel documented
events.description: A Memorandum of Investigation was created regarding the interview of Correctional Officer Tova Noel.

events.title: OIG transmits investigative materials
events.description: The Office of the Inspector General sends a memorandum transmitting investigative materials on Thomas and Noel to the BOP Office of Internal Affairs for administrative purposes, noting the criminal case is closed.

keyFacts: The document is an OIG memorandum transmitting investigative materials on BOP Correctional Officers Michael Thomas and Tova Noel.
The underlying OIG investigation is referenced as OIG# 2019-010614 / OIA# 2019.05324.
The criminal prosecution related to this matter is no longer active; materials are being provided for administrative purposes only.
The transmitted materials include Memoranda of Investigation (MOIs) dated October 8, 2021, documenting interviews of both officers.
The OIG notes its investigative work related to this matter is not yet complete.
